channel.title: How to add dragon claw special to server.(to hit 4 times)
channel.description: hey guys i was wondering if someone could guide me through adding dragon claw special. i already added the special bar to the dragon claws now all i have to do is figure out how to get it to hit 4times and have a working special all it has right now is a special bar.. i would like the help thanks.

item.title: How to add dragon claw special to server.(to hit 4 times)
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

watch n lern:

search “specamount” in client.java and find the item id for a dds. copy and paste everything it says, but change the item id to your dclaws id and change spec amount to 50 instead of 25. then search the dds id again and copy and paste that and change it again to the dclaw code. Also change the hit amount from “2” to “4” and then compile it. it will have dds gfx, but it should still work.

thanks for the replies… but i figured it out on my own… thanks though. i even made a tut on how to do it

Read full topic
item.source: How to add dragon claw special to server.(to hit 4 times)
